entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
